provider.title: AI Provider
provider.desc: Select which AI provider to use for generating tags.

customEndpoint.title: Custom API Endpoint
customEndpoint.desc: Enter the URL for your custom OpenAI-compatible API endpoint.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.desc: Your {provider} API key. Required to use the AI service.
apiKey.getKey: Get it from {url} if you don't have one already.
apiKey.recommendation: We recommend using a dedicated key for this plugin.

model.title: AI Model
model.desc: Choose which AI model to use for tag generation.

maxTags.title: Maximum number of tags
maxTags.desc: Set the maximum number of tags to generate per note.

promptStyle.title: Prompt Style
promptStyle.desc: Choose a predefined prompt style or create your own custom prompt.

customPrompt.title: Custom prompt template
customPrompt.desc: Customize the prompt sent to the AI. Use {maxTags} and {content} as placeholders.

currentPrompt.title: Current prompt template
currentPrompt.desc: This is the prompt template that will be used (read-only). Switch to Custom if you want to edit it.

language.title: Language
language.desc: Choose the language for the plugin interface.

modals.tagAll: This will tag all notes in your vault using the {model} model. This may take a while and consume API credits. Do you want to continue?

notices.analyzing: Analyzing note content and generating tags...

errors.apiKeyMissing: API key not configured. Please add your API key in the plugin settings.
errors.endpointMissing: Custom API endpoint not configured. Please add your endpoint URL in the plugin settings.
